Experiment Description: Check permutation importances. Threshold is either 0 or random_feature (whichever is lower). 10-Fold CV

Comments: PI took very long but features overfit less to training.

Experiment Description: Recursive Feature Elimination with Cross-Validation. 10-Fold CV
Comments: Test score dropped slightly but not significant enough compared to the run time gained

Notes: Narrowed down to 25 features. Best test score so far

Comments: 5-Fold took 8 hours. 10-Fold will take almost double that. Not worth the time
